notes:
I've been convinced that Radiant Flames is better than I first thought, especially if you're playing it on the splash then it can pretty reliably be played at two, or three depending on what you need out of it. Given the number of scions and allies running around, the ability to kill them off, but leave your bigger guys around is a big deal.

After that, Stonefury is probably the runner up as a decently versatile if expensive removal spell.
